info.title: Wondercraft.ai API documentation
info.description:
You can find
out more about Wondercraft.ai
[here](https://www.wondercraft.ai/).

get.description: Get the status of an episode generation
Use this endpoint to verify that your API key is functional

post.description: For a new episode a podcast must have its podcast defaults set. This can be done on the wondercraft platform by navigating to settings under your podcast.

200.description: Successfully created a new podcast episode

get.description: Check the audio generation status for a new episode
